More Posts

Projects

Node JS, Express JS, Socket IO, JQuery, Kik API, Bootstrap
Kik The Code
Winner of the Kik Summer Hackweek 2014. Built a live multiplayer Mastermind web application where you submit your guesses by messaging a bot on Kik.
Ruby On Rails, PostgreSQL, Riot Games API, Bootstrap
League of Valor
Using the Riot Games API, developped a League of Legends RPG in Ruby on Rails. Can catch champions and battle other summoners. In progress
Ruby On Rails, PostgreSQL, Bootstrap
Questionit
A Reddit-like question and answer site built with Ruby on Rails. In progress.
App Js, Node JS
Food Card
Find and share Recipes using Kik. Ranked #387 on top.kik.com
AngularJS, Bootstrap
Github Issue Generator
Developped a tool to help format bug reports
Java, Java Swing
Smack Down
An SE Hackday project where you knock your opponent into the air and smack them back into the ground. Surprisingly a lot of fun for such a simple game.
PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS
Vion Genesis
My first ever programming experience. An online monster catching and battling game. Built from scratch with no frameworks or libraries. Wrote lots of raw SQL simply because I didn't know what wrappers were.

Hi, my name is Jason

I'm a Software Engineering student at the University of Waterloo currently in 2A.
